steps.title: Welcome to your Profile!
steps.content: Take a tour to get familiar with this page. You may also access this tour anytime from this Help.

steps.title: Upcoming Shifts
steps.content: These are upcoming shifts you have successfully signed up for. Shift conflicts will be display in red.

steps.title: Waitlisted
steps.content: These are upcoming shifts you have successfully waitlisted for. Waitlist conflicts will be display in red.

steps.title: Notes
steps.content: These are ExComm's notes on your profile.

steps.title: Edit Profile
steps.content: You may edit your contact information here.

steps.title: SMS Notifications
steps.content: To register for SMS notifications, select a provider. You must also have a phone number. Select or leave blank if you do not want to receive SMS notifications.
